name: OneScreen-ElfFight (LD)
description:
Ludum Dare 31 Entry for Entire Game on One Screen.

Story

Santa's elfs decided to take back the presents they made and they have challenged Santa to a snowball fight.

Move around and throw snowballs at the elfs while collecting the presents.

Controls

  • ASDW: Movement
  • Mouse Click (left): Throw
  • Mouse Wheel: Zoom

Thanks and don't forget to vote!
